function.name: get_eef_pos
function.description: Get the current end effector position of the robot in its own frame in the scheme [x,y,z] in meters

function.name: get_eef_rot
function.description: Get the current end effector rotation of the robot in its own frame as an euler rotation in the scheme [x,y,z]

function.name: resolve_object_from_name
function.description: Get the current position of a simulated object 'pos' and rotation 'rot' as a dict

object_name.description: The name of the object to resolve

function.name: open_gripper
function.description: Opens the gripper of the robot

function.name: close_gripper
function.description: Closes the gripper of the robot

function.name: move_abs
function.description: Moves to the specified absolute position relative to the robot frame

x.description: The x coordinate of the position to move to in meters

y.description: The y coordinate of the position to move to in meters

z.description: The z coordinate of the position to move to in meters
